item.title: Getting Started with Hugo
item.description: Step 1. Install Hugo Go to Hugo releases and download the appropriate version for your OS and architecture. Save it somewhere specific as we will be using it in the next step.

item.title: Hugo blog site github local repo sync
item.description: Hugo Local Setup This blog content is generated by the Hugo static site generator and integrated with GitHub. Steps through publishing and pushing the newest content publicly.

item.title: About The Author
item.description: I architect, implement, administer and troubleshoot servers, network, storage and infrastructure devices local and cloud-based with an interest in DevSecOps. I write about things I am familiar with, things I am learning, and the things that I have had to understand in order to help others understand.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: Privacy Policy devnall.io Privacy Policy devnall.io is a privately owned and operated site run by me. Me/I (“us”, “we”, or “our”) operates the devnall website at https://devnall.
